mapper.select: select * from member_table order by registereddate desc limit 0,10
select board_free.*, member_table.nickname from board_free join member_table on board_free.usercode = member_table.usercode order by registereddate desc limit 0,10
select board_review.*, member_table.nickname from board_review join member_table on board_review.usercode = member_table.usercode order by registereddate desc limit 0,10

SELECT board_inquiry.*, member_table.nickname, CASE WHEN COUNT(bia.questioncode) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS hasAnswer FROM board_inquiry JOIN member_table ON board_inquiry.usercode = member_table.usercode LEFT JOIN board_inquiry_answer bia ON board_inquiry.questioncode = bia.questioncode GROUP BY board_inquiry.questioncode, member_table.nickname ORDER BY hasAnswer ASC, board_inquiry.registereddate ASC LIMIT 0, 10;
